artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: accordion-style book; gray cover with faint linear pattern in a wood grain design; dotted, circular floral shapes in maroon, green and yellow pigments; vertical band in center with inscription in Japanese characters on front cover; ten images on one side of accordion sheets; colorful, expressive images depicted in interior
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Attempts at Humor (Odoke 御東景)
text: Set of all 12 chūban prints from the series Attempts at Humor (Odoke 御東景) bound in an album.
title: Album of 12 prints from the series "Attempts at Humor; Complete Pictures"
